oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A class of asymmetric gapped Hamiltonians on quantum spin chains and its characterization I
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ogata, Yoshiko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematical Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce a class of gapped Hamiltonians on quantum spin chains, which allows asymmetric edge ground states. This class is an asymmetric generalization of the class of Hamiltonians in [FNS]. It can be characterized by five qualitative physical properties of ground state structures. In this Part I, we introduce the models and investigate their properties.
